short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Desync extension to streamline the process of saving websites for later reading.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Desync extension allows users to quickly save webpages to their Desync account by sending the current URL directly to the database. This enables users to easily revisit and manage their saved pages through the Desync platform without manually copying and pasting URLs. This extension is designed for existing Desync members to streamline the process of saving and accessing important webpages.
